note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard Cabin Pressurization Controller Selector "POSITIVE PRESSURE RELIEF VALVE INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Deactivate one valve in the closed position by accomplishing the following:
Press pressure flapper doors closed until flush with fuselage.
Disconnect and cap external static line from primary differential pressure control mechanism (Cap P/N is MS21913D6, ref AMM 21-32-01/501).
Disconnect and cap external static line from secondary differential pressure control mechanism (Cap P/N is MS21913D6, ref AMM 21-32-01/501).
